TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StreamTokenizer extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: The StreamTokenizer class takes an input stream and parses it into "tokens", allowing the tokens to be read one at a time.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an I/O error occurs while parsing the next token.
